rule.name: ClassNameShouldMatchAnnotation
rule.message: Class name should contain annotation name
rule.description: Class name should contain annotation name

rule.name: VariableNameShouldMatchAnnotatedClass
rule.message: Variable name should match annotated class
rule.description: Variable name should match annotated class

rule.name: EntityShouldContainNoArgsConstructor
rule.message: Classes annotated with @Entity should always contain a no-args constructor
rule.description: Classes annotated with @Entity should always contain a no-args constructor

rule.name: ClassShouldContainOnlyOneComponentAnnotation
rule.message: Classes annotated with @Entity should always contain a no-args constructor
rule.description: Class should only contain one component annotation

rule.name: FieldShouldNotHaveAutowired
rule.message: Fields should not be annotated with @Autowired or @Injected. They should be moved in the constructor instead.
rule.description: Fields should not be annotated with @Autowired or @Injected. They should be moved in the constructor instead.

rule.name: ComponentFieldsShouldBeFinal
